analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Tayome, bhikkhave, devesu devasaddā niccharanti samayā samayaṁ upādāya.
analyzed: tayo me bhikkhave devesu deva saddāḥ niccharanti samayā samayam upādāya

original: Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjāya ceteti, tasmiṁ samaye devesu devasaddo niccharati:
analyzed: yasmin bhikkhave samaye ariya sāvakaḥ kesa massuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajjāya ceteti tasmin samaye devesu deva saddaḥ niccharati
esaḥ ariya sāvakaḥ mārena saddhim saṅgāmāya ceta iti iti

original: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo devesu devasaddo niccharati samayā samayaṁ upādāya.
analyzed: bhikkhave paṭhamaḥ devesu deva saddaḥ niccharati samayā samayam upādāya

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, yasmiṁ samaye ariyasāvako sattannaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati, tasmiṁ samaye devesu devasaddo niccharati:
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave yasmin samaye ariya sāvakaḥ sattannam bodhi pakkhiyānam dhammānam bhāvanā anuyogam anuyuttaḥ viharati tasmin samaye devesu deva saddaḥ niccharati
esaḥ ariya sāvakaḥ mārena saddhim saṅgāma iti

original: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo devesu devasaddo niccharati samayā samayaṁ upādāya.
analyzed: bhikkhave dutiyaḥ devesu deva saddaḥ niccharati samayā samayam upādāya

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, yasmiṁ samaye ariyasāvako āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave yasmin samaye ariya sāvako āsavānam khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimutti

original: paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati, tasmiṁ
analyzed: paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati tasmin

original: ‘eso ariyasāvako vijitasaṅgāmo tameva saṅgāmasīsaṁ abhivijiya ajjhāvasatī’ti.
analyzed: esaḥ ariya sāvakaḥ vijita saṅgāmaḥ tam eva saṅgāma sīsam abhivijiya ajjhāvasati iti

original: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo devesu devasaddo niccharati samayā samayaṁ upādāya.
analyzed: bhikkhave tatiyaḥ devesu deva saddaḥ niccharati samayā samayam upādāya

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo devesu devasaddā niccharanti samayā samayaṁ upādāyā”ti.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave tayo devesu deva saddāḥ niccharanti samayā samayam upādāya ati

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
